alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Valleys; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 2:29AM MST until December 14 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, particularly along Highway 20 from Carey to Howe and the interior regions of the central mountains. Winds will gust as high as 40 MPH at times. * WHERE...The Shoshone Lava Beds, Craters of the Moon, Lost River Valleys, Arco Desert, and Mud Lake area, including but not limited to Shoshone, Carey, Tom Cat Summit, Willow Creek Summit, Mackay, Arco, Idaho National Laboratory, and Telegraph Hill. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick travel conditions due to falling and blowing snow. Morning and evening commutes may be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Valleys; Shoshone, Lava Beds
